mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT FROM user u RIGHT JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.id RIGHT JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.name = #{name}

SELECT DISTINCT FROM admin a RIGHT JOIN admin_role ar ON a.id = ar.admin_id LEFT JOIN role r ON ar.role_id = r.id RIGHT JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE a.name = #{name}
